transcript:
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Ji sir, so main inka dekh raha hu, aapki aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haanji aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main inka dekh raha hu, inke bahut se categories hai.
Customer: Lekin ek baat hai wo zyada product mein deal karte hai, hum kam product mein hum focused deal karte hai. Hum sab jagah deal nahi karte, do hi product majorly deal karte hai.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. Jab same service mein kya hota hai, jaise ki activeness account ka active kitna hai aur kya percentage hai to uske bihaf mein listing aati hai to zyada se zyada inke liye active aapse zyada listing inki aapse upar dikh rahi hai jab same mein hota hai na, ye hota hai jab same.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kyunki unka product aur catalogs ka score to humse bhi kam hai.
Executive: Haan, wo to sir maine dekha but kya activeness ki baat hai na, matlab high activeness inke.
Customer: Ye inka bhi hum, inki bhi hamari jitni do hi product hai, fir bhi kai kai jagah unka aage aa raha hai humse bhi aur chota chota package hai fir bhi.
Executive: Vihan ka?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Vihan ka to barabar package chal raha hai sir, chota kahan hai? Ye bhi dekhiye maximizer chala rahe hai.
Customer: Haan lekin inka.
Customer: Kaafi jagah pe unka humse bhi aage aa raha hai.
Customer: Google mein, online mein ya yahan pe.

Executive: To wahi main bata raha hu ki iske alawa aisa nahi hai, ye same package aapse chala rahe hai Vihan wale bhi.
Customer: Wo kai baar chalta hai har mahine listing fluctuate hoti hai, call response, buylead consumption kitna active hai aap, kitna frequently inquiries ko reply kar rahe hai uske bihaf pe wo automatically leta hai. SQS ho gaya, SQS.
Customer: PNS call ho gaya, SQS ho gaya, inke bihaf mein automatically wo fetch karta hai. In sare parameters pe.
Customer: To abhi hum kya workout kar rahe hai bataiye.
Executive: Sir abhi workout karne ka jo hamare paas limited product hai to maine aapse suggested product bhi puche wo nahi hota to us condition mein ye hota hai ki jab lead generation nahi hota thoda sa main market ye hai ki hamare paas demand abhi aa nahi rahi hai.
Customer: Wo to main samajh gaya, wo to thik hai lekin aap jo wo dusri product mein mera dusri category mein dala hua hai na perforating machine wo product puri different hai aur meri perforating machine product different hai.
Customer: To kaafi jo aap buylead abhi dikh rahi hai na mere portal pe wo bhi mere liye irrelevant hai isliye main ye product pura different hai sir.
Customer: Ye ye jo RK wala hai wo hamara similar product hai.
Customer: Ye? Par keyword same hi hai sir, inhone bhi isi keyword ke andar dal rakha hai RK walon ne bhi perforating machine ke andar hi ye dal rakha hai.
Customer: Us us pe jab pehle discuss hua tha to kya dikkat aayi thi? Tabhi tabhi wo baat hui thi ke ye cheez hum dal rahe hai to kaafi buyleads dikha raha hai to IndiaMART wale bol rahe hai aap buylead consume nahi kar rahe to mere liye irrelevant hai to main kaise karu, wahi dikkat aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan, samajh gaya, samajh gaya. Haan. Maine abhi generation hi, haan maine to ek hi keyword ki baat kari usme generation hi abhi kam hai to kaise consume kar sakte hai jab lead aa hi nahi rahi.
Customer: Haan aur aur mere relevant to hai hi nahi usme jo aap 27 ya 28 lead jo bhi aayi hai 20 din mein wo different product ke liye naam same ho sakta hai lekin product different hai puri.
Customer: Haan ab jaise ki agar us product ki us keyword ki bhi baat karenge aapke simple to keyword wise bhi distribution rehta hai.
Customer: Ab jaise ki jo apna hai perforating machine ho gaya, perforating machine mein se deal karte hai to hamare paas ek hi lead aayi hai. Pichle mahine sirf do hi aayi thi, isse pehle ek aayi hai, isse pehle dekhiye 6, 5, 4, 6, 6, 10 demand aa rahi thi.
Customer: Abhi demand nahi hai hamare paas, ji.
Executive: Mera kya concern hai samajh gaye aap, Pranjul ji. Mere mahine mein char se new inquiry aa jaye to bhi mera concern purpose solve ho jata hai. Mujhe lots of inquiries nahi chahiye samajhiye. Mere product us tarike ka hai isliye. Main bhi samajhta hu mere product ki kaafi inquiries nahi hoti lekin mahine mein panch inquiry meri aa jaye to bhi mera thik hai, mera ROI ban jayega.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul.
Executive: To sir ek baar main thoda sa ispe workout kar leta hu. Wahi maine cheeze thi isliye maine online dikhaya cheeze clear hai ki jaise hi by default jaise hi sequence wagera sari cheeze proper hai, har cheez jaise hi thoda sa flow of inquiry increase hoga na demand aayegi. Result apne aap hi convert ho jayega bas thoda sa time ka gap hai isme. To wo automatically by dusra aap ek baar product list nikaliye main aapko dusra mera concern samjhata hu taki aapko bhi andaza aaye dusri baar jab aap workout kare to aap us perspective se bhi dekh sake.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Mera product list nikaliye product wala. Sabhi products.
Customer: Ye hai products sir aapke. Haan haan ye dekhiye niche jo hai usme haan ye meri same product hi hai usme maine different different naam karke dala hua hai wo sabhi meri active hai. Thik hai usme green temper stud karke hai usme main kam deal karta hu isliye wo main active nahi rakha hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Kyunki usme mera kam nahi hota. Pehle main karta tha isliye rakha tha.
Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Abhi dusri dusri category nikaliye.
Executive: Ye major ye dusri mein baki to ek hi ek product hai isme perforating mein ek hai, loan mein ek hai. Baki isme kitne product hai khali isme.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Aur ye weaving loom parts hai usme main deal nahi karta isliye maine inactive kiya hua hai.
Executive: Inactive kiya hua hai. Haan ye weaving loom parts hai, tapping drilling hai, loom spare part hai. Ye ye sab mein main deal nahi karta abhi isliye maine inactive kiya hua hai samajh rahe hai aap. Meri mainly do teen product jo aap upar dekh rahe hai wahi mere main focus hai aur isliye main category mein chala raha hu.
Customer: Wo to mujhe pata hai wo to bataya tha aapne.
Customer: Haan usi liye aur ye product main ab active rakhta hu to mere paas din ki 50 60 70 70 inquiry rehti hai aur main mere kam ki nahi rehti wo isliye maine inactive kar diya wo. Wo agar hamari ranking mein kam karti hai to hum delete bhi kar sakte hai usme uski bhi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Ji. Sahi hai sir aapne.
Executive: Thik hai to main ispe ek baar dekh leta hu jaise hi by default increase hogi thodi si koi inquiries.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan aur mere end se aapko koi bhi support chahiye ya koi updation chahte hai main karu to aap mujhe befikar bataye hum wo bhi karenge usme bhi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul ji.
Executive: Kyunki hum dono ko sath mein milke performance badhana hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is getting irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer's product listed in wrong category.

- Customer is not getting enough relevant inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to workout on the issue.

- Executive asked customer to share concerns.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will look into the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, inquiries, listing
